Info.title: Welcome to the Voting Machine!
Info.info: This is the frontpage of the Voting Machine! You will get a unique voting link by email when the voting starts.
Info.info_2: Only regular members of the guild are allowed to vote. Please exit the meeting if you are not a regular member. If you have received a voting link but are not a regular member, please inform the chairperson or secretary immediately.
Info.info_3: If you have any questions or problems, please contact the chairperson or secretary.

NotFound.title: The page you are looking for was not found
NotFound.description: Check that you have used the correct link and try again. If the problem persists, please contact the chairperson or secretary.

ErrorBoundary.title: An error occurred
ErrorBoundary.message: Reload the page and try again. If the error persists, please contact the chairperson or secretary.

VoterNotFound.title: Voting link not found
VoterNotFound.description: Voting link not found. Check that you have used the correct link and try again. If the problem persists, please contact the chairperson or secretary.

Vote.title: Voting
Vote.election_not_ongoing: The voting for this voting link is not ongoing
Vote.election_not_ongoing_description: The voting for this voting link is not ongoing. The voting has probably already ended. If you think this is an error, please contact the chairperson or secretary.
Vote.vote_instruction: Select the candidates in the order you prefer by dragging them to the Your ballot box and press the Vote button
Vote.audit_info: By pressing the button below, you can copy the ID of your ballot. You can check that your ballot is correct and taken into account in the auditing view when the voting has ended. Save the ID, as you cannot get it again later.
Vote.confirm_vote_description: Check your ballot and press the confirm vote button to confirm your vote. The vote cannot be changed after confirmation.

Login.title: Log in to admin
Login.signin_description: Sign in with your Google account to access the admin panel.
Login.error_unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this application.
Login.error_server_error: A server error occurred. Please try again later.
Login.error_no_code: Invalid authorization code. Please try again.

ElectionList.title: Results
ElectionList.no_previous_results_description: There have been no elections held yet or their results have not been published.

ElectionNotFound.title: Election not found
ElectionNotFound.description: Election not found. Check that you have used the correct link and try again. If the problem persists, please contact the chairperson or secretary.

Audit.title: Auditing
Audit.no_finished_election_description: You can only audit the election whose results have just been published. If you think this is an error, please contact the chairperson or secretary.
Audit.placeholder_no_id: Enter a ballot ID to view the ballot
Audit.placeholder_incorrect_id: No ballot found with this ID

PreviewElection.email_list_instruction: Add the voters' email addresses here separated by line breaks

ElectionResults.invalid_result: Ineligible result. The election will be repeated.
